title: Своя команда
overview: An ordinary high school has a basketball section that all eighth-graders want to get into. But the path is open only to a select few, because the invited coach Sergeeva has her own strict selection criteria. Those who are unlucky decide to succeed in basketball at any cost. Many obstacles arise on their way, but the guys overcome them all and prove to others that they, too, can become an equally strong and friendly basketball team. And most importantly, the boys and girls become a team for life! Each episode is a complete story, a significant episode from the lives of very different teenagers who are united by "Your Team". They solve problems, achieve success, fall in love. They become Personalities!
